$mdSidenav makes it easy to interact with multiple sidenavs in an app.

Usage

// Toggle the given sidenav $mdSidenav(componentId).toggle(); // Open the given sidenav $mdSidenav(componentId).open(); // Close the given sidenav $mdSidenav(componentId).close(); // Exposes whether given sidenav is set to be open $mdSidenav(componentId).isOpen(); // Exposes whether given sidenav is locked open // If this is true, the sidenav will be open regardless of isOpen() $mdSidenav(componentId).isLockedOpen();
